items.question: What types of images can be sharpened?
items.answer: You can sharpen JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. Images should be clear and of decent quality for best results.

items.question: Can I adjust the level of sharpening?
items.answer: Yes! You can customize the sharpening strength to match your desired outcome and image type.

items.question: How long does it take to sharpen an image?
items.answer: Most images are enhanced within seconds, making it quick and efficient for any project.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many images I can sharpen at once?
items.answer: No limits! You can sharpen as many images as you want at once with our batch processing feature.

items.question: Do I need any special software to use this tool?
items.answer: No special software is needed. Simply upload your images on our platform and start enhancing.

items.question: Are there any additional fees for sharpening images?
items.answer: We operate on a pay-per-image model with no hidden fees, making it flexible for your budget.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
items.answer: Yes! There are no subscriptions. You only pay for the images you choose to sharpen.

items.question: What if I don't like the results?
items.answer: If you're not satisfied, you can adjust settings and sharpen again without any additional charge.

items.question: Is there support if I encounter issues?
items.answer: Yes! Our customer support team is available via email and live chat for any questions or troubleshooting.

items.question: Can I use sharpened images commercially?
items.answer: Absolutely! You own the rights to all images sharpened using our tool.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Images?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the transformation. No sign-up required.
